#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int Convert_to_Next_Pallindrome(int n)
{
    int i=0,t=++n,temp_rev=0;
    while(1)
    {
        while(t)
        {
            temp_rev=temp_rev*10+t%10;
            t/=10;
        }

        if(n!=temp_rev)
        {
            ++n;
            t=n;
            temp_rev=0;
        }
        else
            break;
    }
    return n;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        cout << Convert_to_Next_Pallindrome(n)<<"\n";

    }
    return 0;
}
